title: Uncovering COVID Tonight | Guests: Jedediah Bila & Robert Unanue | 11/17/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss some of the "fact-checks" of the Rittenhouse trial. Journalists in San Antonio are being trained not to be objective in their reporting. Glenn explains what his COVID Wednesday night special will show. BlazeTV host Steve Deace joins to discuss Glenn’s COVID special and the bombshells to be announced. Author and former co-host of "The View" Jedediah Bila joins to discuss her latest appearance on "The View," where she clashed with the hosts over her vaccination status and her new book, “Dear Hartley.” Glenn reads off all of the price increases for everyday Americans' budget. Robert Unanue, president and CEO of Goya Foods, joins to discuss how inflation has impacted his business.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
